stepAnswer: Set up conditional formatting on the column "Status" so that a background color is applied to all rows where the status is not equal to "complete".
stepTitle: On your spreadsheet, you are trying to highlight any tasks that are incomplete. What action could you take?
choices: Set up conditional formatting on the column "Status" so that a background color is applied to all rows where the status is not equal to "complete".
Create a filter view to filter on all tasks that have a status of "Complete".
Set up conditional formatting on the "Due Date" column so that a background color is applied to the row when a due date is in the past.
